com.codename1.ui

Class CheckBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.ui.Component
      • com.codename1.ui.Label
        • com.codename1.ui.Button
          • com.codename1.ui.CheckBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animation, StyleListener

    public class CheckBox
extends Button

    CheckBox is a button that can be selected or deselected and displays its state to the user. Check out RadioButton for a more exclusive selection approach. Both components support a toggle button mode using the Button.setToggle(boolean) API.

    • Field Summary
